name: hugging-face-mcp-server
title: Hugging Face MCP Server
summary: Search through millions of Hugging Face models, datasets, applications and research papers, and use the Spaces applications you've selected.
description:
Connect your LLM or agent to the Hugging Face MCP Server so it can:
- do semantic search on over 3 million models, datasets, Spaces applications and research papers hosted on Hugging Face
- retrieve detailed information about a specific model or dataset hosted on Hugging Face
- do semantic search in Hugging Face technical documentation to provide code examples
- use Hugging Face Spaces Tools you (as a Hugging Face user) have explicitly given access to via the HF MCP Server (e.g. to create an image or video, remove background for image, and >100k more Spaces apps)
